cards.name: Ice Cream
cards.description: The conveyor belt does not refill after this round

cards.name: Chocolate Cornet
cards.description: Each player passes one card to the left

cards.name: Donut
cards.description: +3 each if you have more donuts than the most waffles

cards.name: Waffle
cards.description: +4 instead for each pair of Maple Syrup and Waffle

cards.name: Pancake
cards.description: Collecting four or more Pancake cards nets you zero points
